transcript: half of the United States reads below a fifth grade reading level you will double the response rate of anything that you use to advertise by doing one thing take whatever your script is take whatever your ad is and put it into a reading level analyzer and then continue to correct it until you get it below third grade reading level you don't make it dumbed down for smart people all you did is make it easier for smart people to consume and available for Less literate people either way you get twice the customers for the same work
